    • Method Detail

      • getVar

        public ValueHolder getVar(java.lang.String varName)
        Reading a value looks first in the internal vars and then in the document. Every value read from document is cached INTERNALLY. So pay attention if you program functions that modify the document otherwise!
        Parameters:
        varName -
        Returns:
